title: Assignment 01
text:
By definition, generative art is art created by a computer system, either through a specified algorithm or with intentional randomness in the creation process. A few examples of generative art are shared below.



Generative art made by the Journal of Digital History using the R generative art package created by Katharina Brunner


Source: c2dh.uni.lu/projects/journal-digital-history



Generative art by Mark J. Stock


Source: markjstock.com



Generative art created in JavaScript by Espen Kluge


Source: espen.xyz



Generated art from Fall.R with color lightsteelblue2


Source: github.com/datageneration/datavisualization
